room_title: Escape room "Deep Space" by Fort Wayne Escape Room in Fort Wayne
review: Our group had a great time! We chose the Deep Space room and escaped with less than 2 minutes left. The obstacles were challenging and the staff was helpful and friendly... plus there was a dog hanging out in the office. We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Deep Space" by Fort Wayne Escape Room in Fort Wayne
review: Definitely the best room Iâ€™ve come across so far! The puzzles were fun and the A.I. was a sass queen. If you mess up he will let you know. At one point someone dropped a lock box and it broke open and he nearly gave us a heart attack when he got his revenge. 10/10 would recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Deep Space" by Fort Wayne Escape Room in Fort Wayne
review: Had such a great time trying out the new space room! A definite must try

room_title: Escape room "Deep Space" by Fort Wayne Escape Room in Fort Wayne
review: We completed Deep Space with 2 minutes to spare. It was an absolute blast! Time flew by as we tried to solve each puzzle. Definitely worth the money. I would love to go back and do more of the rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Deep Space" by Fort Wayne Escape Room in Fort Wayne
review: They are always helpful and understanding especially if something wasn't working properly. All the staff are friendly and courteous. Our favorite Escape Room at this time is the Deep Space one. You have 60 minutes to get out. And your time starts.... Now :)
